select seq_bd_qna.nextval as no from DUAL

mapper.select: select b.no, b.category, b.title, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, b.view_count as viewCount, b.group_no as groupNo, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth as depth, u.no as userNo, u.id as userId, u.name as userName from bd_qna b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc

select b.no, b.category, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as userName, b.title, b.content, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, b.view_count as viewCount, u.id as userId, b.group_no as groupNo, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth as depth from bd_qna b, users u where b.no = #{no } and b.USER_NO = u.NO
mapper.update: update bd_qna set category = #{category}, title = #{title }, content = #{content }, reg_date = sysdate where no = #{no}
